actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to undertake the phase I design memorandum stage of advanced engineering and design of the project element involving the lowermost 10-mile-long segment of channel modification of Sowashee Creek at Meridian, Miss.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake the advanced engineering and design stage of the Sowashee Creek modification project in Mississippi, at an estimated cost of $450,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to undertake the phase I design memorandum stage of advanced engineering and design of the project element involving the lowermost 10-mile-long segment of channel modification of Sowashee Creek at Meridian, Miss.
